name: Feed the machine (Kids spelling game)
description:
Introduction:

With almost 900 words to learn and spell Feed The Machine aims to help kids learn about synonyms, writing alternatives, and opposites of words in English. This is done with cute pixel-art, smooth animation and fun gameplay mechanics.

How to play:

(Read the 'how to play' guide in-game for detailed gameplay breakdowns )

  • Read the prompt from the robot, and think of an answer which fits in the given number of letters.
  • If you need help; click the hint button next to the 'Feed!' button
    • This will give you a letter of the word the robot asks you for.
  • When you have typed in your answer, click 'Feed!' to feed the delicious word to the robot

The game will save your highscores (First, Second, and Third place).
